title: Council Regulation (EC) No 686/96 of 10 April 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1975/95 on actions for the free supply of agricultural products to the people of Georgia, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Kyrgyzstan and Tajikistan
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 686/96 of 10 April 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1975/95 on actions for the free supply of agricultural products to the people of Georgia, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Kyrgyzstan and Tajikistan
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The terms 'and Tajikistan` shall be replaced by ',Tajikistan and Turkmenistan` in the title and in Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 1975/95.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 April 1996.
For the Council
The President
S. AGNELLI
(1) OJ No L 191, 12. 8. 1995, p. 2.
